name: Monstruct!
description:
In eras gone by, devastated by the aggression of "heroes", "champions", and "chosen ones", the other denizens of the world came together and devised a solution for their survival.

Monstruction - the process of creating Monstons, short for Monster Automatons, that are infused with the "EXP" and "Loot" that the humankind insatiably craved.

With Monstons scattered far and wide, and humankind now blindly preoccupied by their endless grind, peace finally returned to the realm for good.

At present, Weltgeist, a young Monstructor, has left home in pursuit of his ambitions. With nothing but his tools and small atelier, he hopes to one day become the greatest Monstructor the world has ever known...
